item.title: Everest Consolidator Acquisition Corp S-1
item.description: Everest Consolidator Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on October 19, 2021 had 71093 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1662 instances combination - 1238 instances shares - 985 instances may - 890 instances initial - 870 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
